text: Sceolan is as one with the essence of frost and winter
May the Destroyer of Khorne disgrace his patron God with defeat it shall mean his demise
Arbaal is turned into a Chaos Spawn
Khorne's momentum will be set to 0
Snow and ice rise from the land, freezing and blinding any and all in their path with an unnatural cold.
The mage focuses Qhaysh into a wave of pure kinetic energy, pushing aside all nearby enemies
Torinubar is a master of the Asur art of Kineticism, the craft of focusing the wind of Qhaysh into kinetic energies that he can wield to either defend himself or crush his enemies.
